snippet: Several of those leadership changes, which were announced Saturday, come at a time of strong economic growth in China but continuing worries about inflation and lending.
lead_paragraph: Several of those leadership changes, which were announced Saturday, come at a time of strong economic growth in China but continuing worries about inflation and lending.

headline.main: China Reshuffles Top Leadership at Financial Regulators
headline.print_headline: China Reshuffles Top Leadership at Financial Regulators
headline.seo: China Reshuffles Leadership at Financial Regulators
